sentences.sentence: He glanced up and saw an open fanlight leading to the locked office next door.
sentences.translation: 他向上一瞥，看到一扇开着的气窗，通向锁着的隔壁办公室。

sentences.sentence: The bedrooms also have cross ventilation via fanlight windows above doors.
sentences.translation: 卧室则通过门上的扇形窗对流通风。

sentences.sentence: Eyes open to see, God is really uncommon two Flying Swallow — do not know when I flew into the small fanlight room.
sentences.translation: 睁眼一看，天啊，真是稀罕事- - -两只小燕子不知道什么时候从小气窗飞进了我的房间。
